This property verifies that the signal xwb_dat_o becomes zero one clock cycle after the reset signal grst is asserted.

The property triggers on every positive edge of the clock signal gclk, but is disabled when grst is low (0). When grst becomes high (1), the property requires that on the next clock cycle (##1), the signal xwb_dat_o must equal the hexadecimal value 32'h0.

The property ensures that the system properly initializes xwb_dat_o to zero following a reset condition.
